website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei Mate 10 Pro is a powerful phone that uses a dedicated AI processor to improve camera capabilities and day-to-day performance.
pros: Connects to bigger screen for desktop experience
cons: No headphone jack, microSD card slot, or wireless charging

customer_reviews.title: Buy it..you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Mate 10 Pro it was on Amazon @ £380...I had been seriously looking at the Moto 6 plus and realised that for not much more I could move from mid range to flagship...and what a difference...two words to Describe this phone..'speed , quality'...the battery life!!..end of day two from my last charge and I'm on 56%!! I'm not a heavy user but I only ever managed a day on my old 6P...I was concerned about moving from native android to Huawei's UI but I needn't have been..its very intuitive, a lot of the pre installed apps are what I would have installed anyway...great camera, great value..Recommended!

customer_reviews.text: I wanted an upgrade from my Samsung J5 2017 and looked into and finally purchased the Mate 10 Pro due to the positive reviews, substantial 46% discount and after two weeks use I am delighted with it. Ignore the tech review comments about the tricky EMUI interface, it is not that different and plenty of help available online to get it all set up how you want. Super fast performance, great screen and call quality, camera excellent so far and I am getting an easy 2 - 3 days battery life as an average user, the included clear soft case and ready fitted screen protector are the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Flagship phone for less money!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best phone I've had. I wanted a large, top of the range phone but didn't want to pay an extortionate amount. This has surpassed all of my expectations. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JoAngel

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality and service ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Amazon at a very good price. It had a power consumption problem. Sent it to Huawei for repair, the phone came back with a new battery but still same problem. Sent it back again and came back OK with power consumption, but with fingerprint problem. Sent it back again for repair but was informed that it is out warranty because of broken/physical damage. The phone was never dropped or damaged by me and I can't see any physical damage. So, I haven't got the chance to actually use the mobile. It has been in the process of repair and now it is out of warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Get this handset (if it's on sale)
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone as a replacement to my Huawei P10 plus. It's very similar to my previous phone with regards to screen size/sound quality etc. It does have a better feel in terms of build quality but I think that can be expected from a newer and more expensive handset. The camera on this phone is superb. I think the hardware isn't much different to that in the p10plus with the duel camera on the back, but camera software appears to have improved considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Pike

customer_reviews.title: Fast mobile with great battery life
customer_reviews.text: My Huawei mate 10 Pro is the best phone I've ever had. Battery life is fantastic, screen is nice and sharp and performs all task very fast. Also love the camera takes excellent shots, video is ok at 1080p but 4K has no image stabilization. I would recommend the Razer Phone USB-C to 3.5 mm Adapter - THX Certified USB Type C to 3.5 mm Jack Audio Adapter, for better volume and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great, only charging once per day and that doesn't take much more than 45 mins. Hope it lasts. One thing thats niggling me is the keyboard. Not sure what it is but coming from a samsung, I'm having a hard time getting spaces between every word when writing at normal pace. Might just take a bit of getting used to. Otherwise phone seems great
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone and battery
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Very fast, no lag, tonnes of memory both ram and storage. Great screen and superb battery life. I usually get two days of good use. So what, it is the 2017 flagship? To get a £800 phone a year or so later for this sort of money is simply great. Oh. The camera is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: "pickledbug"
